meanings.definition: The state or quality of being attainable.
meanings.sent1: Her attainabilities were evident in her determination to succeed.
meanings.sent2: The attainabilities of the project seemed within reach with proper planning.
meanings.sent3: His attainabilities shone through when he finally completed the challenging puzzle.
meanings.sent4: The attainabilities of the students soared as they worked hard to improve their grades.
meanings.sent5: The attainabilities of the new technology opened up endless possibilities for innovation.

meanings.definition: The ability to be achieved or reached.
meanings.sent1: The attainabilities of the goal motivated him to keep pushing forward.
meanings.sent2: With dedication, the attainabilities of success became clearer to her.
meanings.sent3: The attainabilities of the treasure hunt made it an exciting adventure for the kids.
meanings.sent4: His attainabilities in sports made him a valuable player on the team.
meanings.sent5: The attainabilities of the recipe were evident in the delicious aroma coming from the kitchen.
